profile.name: Alex Chen
profile.title: Full Stack Developer & Cloud Architect
profile.summary: Passionate full-stack developer with 8+ years of experience building scalable web applications and cloud infrastructure. I love turning complex problems into simple, beautiful solutions. Expert in React, Node.js, Python, and cloud-native architectures. Open source contributor and tech community speaker. Currently focused on AI/ML integration and microservices at scale.

projects.title: CloudSync Pro
projects.description: A real-time file synchronization platform built with Node.js and React. Supports end-to-end encryption, collaborative editing, and seamless integration with popular cloud providers. Handles 50K+ concurrent users.

projects.title: AI Task Manager
projects.description: Smart task management app that uses AI to prioritize and categorize tasks automatically. Features natural language input, voice commands, and smart scheduling based on user behavior patterns.

projects.title: DevMetrics Dashboard
projects.description: Analytics dashboard for development teams. Tracks code quality, deployment frequency, team productivity metrics, and provides AI-powered insights for process improvement.

projects.title: E-Commerce Platform
projects.description: Full-featured e-commerce solution with inventory management, payment processing, and recommendation engine. Built for high availability with microservices architecture.

projects.title: Real-time Chat Platform
projects.description: Scalable messaging platform supporting group chats, file sharing, video calls, and end-to-end encryption. Built to handle millions of messages per day.

projects.title: Open Source CLI Tool
projects.description: Developer productivity CLI tool for managing cloud resources, automating deployments, and generating boilerplate code. 5K+ GitHub stars.

highlights: Leading architecture decisions for the entire platform serving 5M+ users
Driving adoption of AI/ML capabilities across products, increasing user engagement by 35%
Managing a team of 8 engineers and mentoring senior developers
Reduced infrastructure costs by 40% through optimization and right-sizing
Established engineering best practices and documentation standards
Led development of the core platform team's microservices infrastructure
Architected systems serving 1M+ daily active users with 99.9% uptime
Established code review practices and improved deployment frequency by 3x
Mentored 4 junior developers and conducted technical interviews
Built the entire frontend from scratch using React and TypeScript
Implemented REST APIs and database schemas for core business logic
Reduced page load time by 60% through code splitting and caching
Led migration to cloud-native infrastructure on AWS
Contributed to product roadmap and feature prioritization
Developed responsive websites and web applications for 20+ clients
Worked with modern JavaScript frameworks including React and Vue.js
Implemented agile methodologies improving project delivery by 25%
Contributed to open source projects and internal component library
Gained hands-on experience with full-stack development
Built internal tools that improved team productivity by 20%
Learned version control, testing, and CI/CD best practices
